name: Lighto
description:
Authors: Juraj Zalabai, Norbert Vígh, Adrián Kabáč

Objective of game: escape imprisonment by unlocking wooden door with key

Keys: Movement: WASD with mouse

              L - turn on light

                   - it has battery life

                   - it can be recharded in spawn

              E - Shoot beam to kill enemy(you need to have ultra battery - pink battery on                      ground)

              SPACE - push button to open electric doors(you need at least 50% of your                            battery life to push the button)
